context: Does this have yaw control? As in, can you twist the stick clockwise/counterclockwise?

context: do u have to buy it and download it at the same time
response: No, you can buy it here and click download later. Then, you can go to "Your Games and Software Library" and the key should be there. You can redeem that key through Steam.

context: can you play this on xbox one? or do you have to play it on xbox 360 only?
response: No. This game is for Xbox 360. The Xbox one is not backwards compatible. It will not play this game, or ANY Xbox 360 game for that matter.
